facts.prey: Small fish, plants, fish eggs, larvae, other small marine creatures
facts.fun fact: Many jellyfish can produce their light.
facts.biggest threat: Sharks, birds, tuna, and sea anemone
facts.most distinctive feature: Tentacles hanging from the body that help aid the jellyfish's stinging characteristics
facts.predators: Sharks, birds, tuna, and sea anemone
facts.favorite food: Small fish, plants, fish eggs, larvae, other small marine creatures

physical characteristics.length: 0.5 inches to 16 inches, though they can grow to 7 feet
